load LOGNAME		: Loads event log from LOGNAME.txt.
play [PROFILE]		: Starts event playback. Profiles: normal (default), verbose, fast, faster, forward
pause				: Pauses event playback.
step				: Steps to the next event.
reload				: Reloads the current event log.
debugmode STATE		: Enable/disable debug mode. States: 0, 1
showthreads TURN	: Show thread markers for given turn.
clearthreads		: Clear thread markers.
